Easily the greatest cyberpunk sci-fi action game of all time. It has everything you could possibly want in the genre. Dozens of open ended maps, truly innovative gameplay with a mind-bending movement and parkour system that's honestly ahead of its' time, and a horrifyingly dark dystopian aesthetic combined with the beautiful soundtrack by Gabe Newell himself give it the perfect atmosphere fit for a game of this caliber. Decades from now, future generations will still be talking about the glory of Ricochet. If you have a pc, you owe it to yourself to play this work of art.

Ricochet es un meme, pero m√°s all√° de eso, es un juego con un concepto interesante y creo que se ha explotado muy mal, ya que de ser trabajado y quien sabe si alg√∫n d√≠a realmente sacan Ricochet 2, creo que tiene potencial para ser un juego altamente competitivo, pero hay mucho por pulir.

Sin embargo analizando lo que tenemos hoy en d√≠a, el juego es super b√°sico, saltar entre plataformas y arrojar proyectiles a tus enemigos para que caigan al vac√≠o y entonces anotar puntos, quien consiga m√°s puntos gana, as√≠ de simple, el juego es puramente multijugador y esta pr√°cticamente muerto, si encontr√°s una partida con jugadores tienes much√≠sima suerte.

Sin embargo existe la alternativa de jugar con bots (tendr√°s que instalarlos, es f√°cil), y hay que destacar que lo simple tiene su gracia, para jugar con amigos es realmente divertido, podes pasar un ratito de chill y risas tranquilamente.

A charming and humble 
It looks really stupid and that's because it is. However, the fun you can have out of this game is impeccable. Welcome to all players, new and returning. Ricochet is a nice change of pace from other games of the genre and surprisingly not as dead as people assume, There's events and (infrequent) public servers. If you can't catch an online game, grab some friends along and shoot some disks!

I love this game's sound design, it has such a unique sound to it that is clearly a product of it's time in the best way possible


there's Only 1 game mode and 3 official maps (custom maps exist and you won't have trouble finding/playing them) however the gameplay itself is surprisingly fun to come back to  


deserves a sequel to expand the ideas, Valve please cancel Half Life 3 and focus on the important games

Seemingly simple yet surprisingly complex to master. Shame it doesn't have players very often, although that shouldn't come off as a surprise considering the game ships with only 3 maps and the gameplay can get a bit repetitive fairly quickly.

Not sure if I'd recommend buying the game on its own because of it, but it's a nice bonus if you're getting the Valve Complete pack. Would love to be able to play it more often :)
kino

Ricochet is chaotic fun. You run around shooting discs at people above purgatory, with various power-ups to spice up gameplay. Unfortunately, you'll rarely ever find a lobby unless the Valve Complete Pack goes on sale or there is some sort of event planned. Due to this I wouldn't recommend it.

Definitely not worth 5 bucks.
If you really want to buy this, just buy it through Valve Complete Pack.

This is the best game i have ever played...
The first time i saw the beautiful graphics i was hooked. my mouth creating pools of drool, because of how mouth wateringly amazing these graphics were. Furthermore the combat system is one of the best from all of the many games i have played.

Some people may say that valves best game was half life or portal, but in my humble opinion Ricochet is the best. It is truly hard to comprehend the beauty of this great game. 10 out of 10 would recommend.

La verdad este juego me parece una gran obra maestra por parte de valve, simplemente el juego mas entretenido y emocionante que haya jugado ademas de los half life. 

Mi experiencia fue la siguiente, entre al videojuego y decidi ver que servidores habia, me sorprendi al ver la gran cantidad de servidores que habia (1 server), decidi entrar al server con mas jugadores que habia (2 jugadores), Al momento de que se descargue el primer archivo se demoro aproximadamente 6 minutos y luego de eso crasheo el juego. 

Esa fue toda mi experiencia en este maravilloso juego 100% recomendado.

buy it

This game was, in the end, fun. Thought there are some hurdles to hop over.
1. Aim bug
  When you start playing, you can't look around. This can easily be fixed by turning on "use raw mouse input." Small, but glaring bug.
2. It's lonely here
  There is usually no one in any of the servers when you first join. So people are tempted to play servers with bots.

Overall while the game has some glaring issues, it's a fun play if you give it a chance (or two). I recommend this game, if you have patience to learn it.
